title: When Harry Met [Y/N]
body:
Masterlist

Word Count: 3896

Warning:FLUFF CENTRAL!!! 

**AN- SO PLEASE DON’T KILL ME FOR HOW LONG THIS TOOK TO WRITE! I’ve been having a major writers block moment but today, inspiration hit and here is PART NINETEEN! HOW CRAZY IS THAT?! **

Harry walked into the room that had become a double office for him and [Y/N], wearing only his boxers and a baggy white hoodie. The only sounds that could be heard were the sounds of the keys being pressed on [Y/N]’s laptop and the padding of Harry’s feet on the wooden floor of the office. [Y/N] looked up from her computer screen and smiled at her boyfriend, removing her glasses momentarily to rub at her eyes. Harry sat on his computer chair and wheeled over to his love’s desks and rest his legs on the edge of it.

“My mum wants to know if we want to go and spend the weekend at her house.” [Y/N] quickly signed off the email that she’d been writing, before making sure that her meeting with a decorator was booked fully for the week after.

“That would be nice, I’ve missed her. Do you want to go tomorrow then? Stay until Sunday?”

“Yeah if that’s all good?” [Y/N] nodded before smiling at her boyfriend, her eyes closing for a few seconds before opening again and looking at Harry fully. “Take a break, babe. You’ve been in here since 7:30 and it’s already 3. Come and have an hour nap with me or something.”

“I can’t sweets. I’ve got a Skype meeting with a caterer for the Christmas party. I’ll not be long, actually I could do with you being here with me for it, it’s your Christmas party after all.” Harry wheeled so he was in front of [Y/N], his hands coming to rest on her knees.

“I’ve told you, it’s not MY party, it’s OURS now! You live here with me. Also, a caterer? Two months before the party? It’s not even been Halloween yet.” [Y/N] shook her head while chuckling lightly.

“Baby, you’re funny. This is the first of what will turn into 4 or 5 meetings sweets. We’ve got today’s which is going over the kind of foods we want to have there, then the next one they’ll go through a menu of things and see what we like or don’t like. The third we’ll actually meet up and taste the food.” Harry’s eyes lit up at the sound of a food tasting session. “Finally, the week before the party we’ll have one final tasting session just to make sure that everything is good. Then that meeting we’ll also go through the set up for the food and things. This will happen for the decorators too.”

“You are absolutely amazing at what you do, my love. How long until the meeting with them?” [Y/N] double checked her diary before letting Harry know that it wouldn’t be for another ten minutes so if he needed a wee to go now. “I’ll be back shortly.” He planted a kiss on his girlfriend’s lips before walking out of the room.

A few minutes later Harry walked back into the office, wearing a plain black top and carrying two mugs with him.

“If you’re not having a nap then you’re going to enjoy this cup of coffee that your insanely hot boyfriend has brought for you to drink while we talk to the caterers about our Christmas party menu. Can we get them to make glazed pigs in blankets on sticks?”

[Y/N] took the mug from Harry’s hands and took a sip of the coffee, letting the hot liquid burn her throat as she did. Harry sat on his chair and wheeled it around the table, so they were sat next to one another and ready to start the Skype meeting.

“Oh my insanely hot boyfriend knows the way to my heart! Thank you!” Once she’d placed her drink on the desk, she turned to Harry and kissed his lips quickly. “And yeah, we can have glazed pigs in blankets, my love.”

***

When their alarm went off the following morning, [Y/N] was the first to wake up. Once she’d turned the alarm off, she turned over so she was facing him. His face was pushed into the pillow, his lips pouting ever so slightly and his hair falling over his eyes. She brought her hand up to brush his hair away and pressed her lips to his to try and wake him up.

“Baby? We need to get up so we can go and see your mum.” When Harry didn’t budge from his sleep, [Y/N] moved her hand so the back of it was against the soft skin of his cheek. Her fingers brushed at his face softly, watching as his breathing became a little ragged. “I know you’re awake, sleepy head.” His lips lifted into a small, almost unnoticeable smirk.

“’m not awake, dunno what you mean, angel.” Harry sunk further into the pillow underneath his head, bringing his arms to wrap around      [Y/N]’s waist to pull her into his hard chest. The pair lay for a few moments basking in one another’s presence, wanting nothing more than for the moment to never end.

“Come on, gorgeous. We have to get up and get going. You promised me a McDonald’s breakfast before we left and it’s already 9am!” She tried to pull herself from Harry’s grasp, only to be pulled even closer to him, her front hitting his with a thump and a groan.

“We aren’t leaving his bed until I get at least one kissy from you. Then we can get up and get ready to go, promise.” His eyes opened and [Y/N]’s thumb came to wipe away the sleep that had formed in the corners of them over night. Her hands rest on his jawline, and her thumbs rubbed at his cheekbones as she leaned in to press her lips against Harry’s. She pulled away but Harry brought his hands up to rest at her neck, pulling her in for more. “I said at least one, I’ve got another good one for you right,” he pulled his forehead away from hers to look into her eyes, and then proceeded to move his lips back toward hers, “here.” When their lips touched again, they both moved impossibly close to the other, their breaths becoming one.

When they finally parted, they were both gasping for breath and smiling widely. The both of them stretched their bodies before standing from the bed, tired eyes on the both of them. Harry walked into the closet while [Y/N] walked to turn the shower on so she could clean her body before their long car journey. Before stepping under the hot water, she brushed her teeth and got the shower products she wanted to use ready.

“Hey, mind if I join you?” [Y/N] looked through the shower door to see Harry stood in just his boxers with a smile on his face. “No funny business, I just can’t be bothered waiting for you to finish.”

“I guess, but no funny business! And don’t get my hair wet, I only washed it last night.” Harry stepped into the shower and stepped under the water, making his girlfriend move out of the stream of the water; causing her to groan loudly. “IT’S COLD NOT BEING UNDER THERE!”

“Here, turn around so your back is against me.” While she turned around, Harry grabbed the shower gel and loofa before lathering it up. “I’ll wash you. Just stand here and keep warm.”

“Thank you gorgeous.”

***

“CHAAAIIIIIIIN, KEEP US TOGETHER!!” The car was filled with the sounds of Fleetwood Mac playing, and laughter from the two people. Harry turned the dial in the car to turn the music down, taking his eyes off the road for a second to look at his girlfriend.

“We won’t be long until we’re there, ladybug.” [Y/N]’s hand fumbled around to grab onto Harry’s, bringing it up to kiss lovingly. Harry then brought [Y/N]’s hand up to kiss too, a smile plastered on both of their faces as they did. Their hands retreated to rest on [Y/N]’s leg, not untangling from one another as they did so.

“Good, my bum is starting to go numb from sitting here for so long.” A soft chuckle was shared between the two people before the car fell quiet once more, Fleetwood Mac still playing through the speakers at a reduced volume.

The rest of the car ride was silent, comfortably so, but still silent. Harry would steal glances at his girlfriend, and smirked when she caught him staring. As they pulled up to Anne’s house, [Y/N] saw the woman who’d given her the best boyfriend standing at the door, a large smile similar to Harry’s adorning her face.

Anne walked toward the car once it stopped and rather than saying hello to her son, she walked over to his girlfriend and embraced her tightly, telling her how much she’d missed her and was happy to see her again. Harry stood to the side, a loving smile on his face as he watched two of his favourite women hugging and smiling together. Once the hug broke, his mum opened her arms for him and he walked straight into them, leaning down to be at her level and holding her just as tightly as she was holding him. [Y/N] brought her hand up and placed it upon Harry’s which sat on his mother’s back, enjoying the love that was radiating from the pair.

“Come on you two, let’s get you inside where it’s warm. You still drink coffee, right lovely?” [Y/N] could see Harry chuckled besides her as she replied to the woman who raised her boyfriend.

“Only with my oxygen.” Anne laughed at her response before walking them into the kitchen of her home and placing a hot coffee in front of each of them. “Oh you are an actual superstar! Thank you.” The first sip of coffee hit [Y/N]’s throat and she closed her eyes in bliss. Coffee had been the thing that got her through so many days but now she’d grown to just love the taste, and feeling it gave her when she drank it, no longer needing it for the energy.

The three people walked through the house and into Anne’s living room, where the TV played a Strictly Come Dancing rerun quietly. As Harry and [Y/N] sat on the smaller of the sofas that sat in the room, Harry pulled his girlfriend into him and draped her legs over his own, using his hands to rub at her calves while she rest her head on his shoulder.

“How’ve you been, Anne? It seems like it’s been ages since I last saw you.” Anne placed her mug of tea on the coffee table before smiling at the two people in front of her. Though she would never admit it, she was sceptical when Harry had told her that he’d met a girl in Starbucks and that she’d been a fan; sceptical that the girl was only wanting to date him because he was Harry Styles; and sceptical that Harry’s heart would be broken. But seeing the two of them in front of her, Harry’s eyes flicking to his girlfriend every now and then to make sure she was still there, and his lips not being able to stay in a straight line whenever he did, she knew that they were good together, and that they were happy. Harry was happy, and she was happy that he was happy. She’d grown to love [Y/N] like a daughter and knew that it wasn’t about the fame, but that she really, truly loved Harry and Anne couldn’t be more grateful.

“I’ve been good thank you sweets. Really good.” She smiled at [Y/N], who had placed her hand on Harry’s which were resting on her legs at that point. “What are your plans for the next few weeks?”

“I have graduation in three weeks and then Harry flies out to LA for Halloween the day after. I’ll be having meetings regarding the Christmas party and then I have to meet up with my boss to decide what’s happening next year and where we want to take things. Feel free to come down for a bit while Harry’s swanning it in the sun, if you’d like!” Harry smiled at his mum, too wrapped up in his thoughts that he hadn’t heard her speak to him.

“Sorry, what was that?”

“You really are ridiculous sometimes. I asked why you’re in LA.”

“It’s the Casamigo’s Halloween party, and then I have to have a few meetings with Jeff to discuss the new album. I’ll only be gone for a week or two. Then it’ll be back home to my gorgeous girlfriend and planning Christmas.” [Y/N]’s cheeks heated as Harry called her gorgeous, and she lightly kissed his shoulder as he grabbed her hand. “But, [Y/N], don’t forget that when I’m in LA Liv is coming for a couple of days.” [Y/N]’s eyes widened at the realisation before turning to Anne.

“I forgot she was coming! You’re still more than welcome. Gems could come too, and we’ll have a proper girly day!”

“That would be lovely, dear.”

***

After lunch, Harry and [Y/N] had gone upstairs to unpack their bags while Anne popped to the shops to get a few bits for their evening meal. When she returned to the house, the couple weren’t downstairs and so she walked up to Harry’s bedroom to see if they were there. The door was ajar slightly and as she peered around it, she saw her son and his girlfriend underneath the covers, with their foreheads touching, fast asleep. Even though they were covered by a thin sheet, she could see the outline of Harry’s hand resting upon [Y/N]’s hip. She smiled at the view before taking a quick photo-purely to show the two later on in the day-and leaving the room, closing the door behind her as to not wake them up when she started to cook.

An hour later, [Y/N] walked through to the kitchen with tired eyes and a smile plastered on her face. Anne had Queen playing through her speaker while she made the lasagne for their dinner. When she heard someone at the door, she turned around with a smile and ushered the younger girl into the kitchen and to sit on one of the stools at the island.

“Did you have a nice nap?” [Y/N] nodded, while yawning and rubbing at her eyes.

“I did thank you. I blame your son for this by the way, he’s got me into the habit of having a nap every now and then, but I hate it. It makes me feel so unproductive.”

“He’s a nuisance like that. He’s always been the same too, having a quick hour nap through the day. But then he wonders why he can’t sleep on a night.” [Y/N]’s head nodded quickly, as if to prove that she really did agree.

“That happens every time he takes a nap! But if I haven’t had one and could fall asleep easily, he’ll talk to me until I’m no longer sleep then we’re both awake for hours longer than necessary. It’s a good job I love him.” Anne smiled at that, knowing that Harry really was loved, and it wasn’t just a show. The way it so easily fell from [Y/N]’s mouth made her realise even more that what the two shared was real.

“You really do love him, don’t you? This isn’t a short-term thing.”

“I hope it isn’t a short-term thing, in my eyes I know that Harry is it for me. I assure you that I will do everything in my power to make Harry the happiest I can. He came into my life when it was hectic, and even though he’s a busy man himself, he was willing to spend as much time as he could with me when I wasn’t trying to write essays and get everything sent off, so I can graduate.” [Y/N] smiled at the top of the island remembering everything she’s gone through with Harry. “When he goes away, even if it’s just for a couple of hours to go to an interview, or if he has a meeting, my heart physically aches until he comes home and hugs me. Sometimes I feel weird and that he thinks I’m too clingy.” Anne stayed silent, so she could hear the rest of what [Y/N] was saying, the smile on her face never dimming. “I’ve seen him perform a couple of times but when I saw him do the gig in LA for a few people, I came to realise just how utterly proud I am of him. He gives his all to everything he does and seeing him performing just makes me heart swell even more. It’s the little things that make me realise how much I love him, the way he will hold eye contact while I’m talking, even if I’m looking a different way, the way he just grabs my hand when we’re sat down, and draws patterns on it; the way that when he wakes up in the middle of the night he’ll grab onto my waist and pull me even closer to him, with his nose pressed to the back of my neck as he drifts back off into sleep; and mainly, the love he has, and shows for you. He loves me, but he honestly adores you! He tells me all the time that he loves you and I realise that you are number one in his life, but that is completely fine with me. You’ve brought the most loving, respectful, trustworthy man into the world and I love you for that.”

“[Y/N], you have no idea how lovely that was to hear. Can I tell you something?”

“Of course.” It was almost a whisper, her voice wavering as the nerves hit her.

“The day that Harry called me and told me that he’d met a girl in Starbucks and that she’d been a fan of his for a while, I got so scared that the girl was in it for the money, and the fame of being linked with ‘Harry Styles’,” Anne made air quotes around her son’s name, while [Y/N] came to realise that the girl Anne was talking about, was her. “I’ve known for a while that it wasn’t the case, but hearing you tell me all of those things, and seeing you and Harry together, I realise how stupid I was to ever think that. I love you and I love that you love Harry.”

“I have never thought of Harry as anything but ‘Harry’. My mind has never gone ‘Oh my days I’m dating Harry Styles’, it’s ‘oh my days, I’m dating Harry, and I love him’. Harry is the most down to earth, loving man that has ever walked the earth. He’s the man who loves his family more than anything and would do literally anything for them. Your son is the best thing that has ever happened to me, and the world; so yeah, I was a fan before I met him, but now I’m his fan in a completely different way.”

[Y/N] stood up from her place and let Anne’s arms wrap around her. They stood in a hug for five minutes before Harry walked into the kitchen and looked at the two women curiously.

“What’s going on here?” Anne let go of [Y/N] and walked back to the oven while [Y/N] walked to Harry, wrapping her arms around him and nesting her face in his neck.

“Nothing, feel better after your nap?”

“I do for now, until later when I can’t sleep.” Everyone in the room laughed and as it died down, Anne could be heard to hum happily. She turned around to see Harry pressing his lips to [Y/N]’s, pulling away quickly and smiling at her with his eyes being slightly narrowed due to his cheeks rising with the smile.

***

“Where’s [Y/N]?” Harry sat on the sofa next to his mum, bringing his phone out of his pocket so he could sit comfortably.

“Oh, she’s just having a quick shower, she’ll be down in twenty minutes or so. Can we have a chat please?” Anne placed her mug on the coffee table and turned her body, so she was facing her son, her hands on her knees and her head tilted slightly.

“Of course! What’s bothering you?”

“How do you know that you’re in love? Like, when it’s the real deal and you want it to last forever?” Harry looked straight into his mum’s eyes, hoping to get her true reaction. What he couldn’t see were the thoughts that went through her mind. Her conversation with [Y/N] replaying in her head.

“What’s making you ask this?”

“I’ve got something to do but I just want to be sure that what I’m feeling is what I think it is.”

“You know you’re in love when the first person that comes to mind when you do anything, is them. When you can close your eyes and picture them sat smiling at you; when they’re happiness means everything to you and you would do anything you could to make them happy; when if you aren’t with them you want to be with them, even if they’re only in the room next to you; and when any time their name is spoken, you immediately smile and your heart starts beating faster because you’re excited. Being in love is something that you do have to work on though, and it isn’t always sunshine. You have blips when you’re in love, but it’s the love you share that means you can’t walk away.” Anne looked at Harry, who had a serious look on his face, playing with the rings on his fingers and his knee bouncing fast. “Is everything okay?”

Harry didn’t respond, the silence in the room almost deafening to Anne, who worried that Harry was going to tell her that he was no longer in love with the girl who was upstairs, and that he was going to end things with her. She knew it wasn’t fair to think that but when Harry had been silent for a few seconds, scrolling through his phone, she feared the worst. Until Harry turned his phone around and showed her the screen he was on.

“I love her mum. She is the love of my life and I’ve known for a while now. I know we’ve only been in a relationship for seven months, but we were dating for three months before that. I love her more than I love myself and I want her to be by my side for the rest of my life, every day I want to see her, and only her. I want to wake up next to her on a morning, I want to have children with her, I want to travel with her and I want to grow old with her. She’s my everything.”

The light blue box sat in his underwear drawer, underneath all of them where he knew no one would see it. The photo he was showing Anne had the box open, a soleste cut, white gold ring, with the words ‘all my love, H’ engraved on the underside of it. He couldn’t help the smile on his face as he watched his mum’s eyes widen, then glisten as tears threatened to spill.

“I want to ask her to marry me.”

“I want to ask her to marry me.”

**AN- SO PLEASE DON’T KILL ME FOR HOW LONG THIS TOOK TO WRITE! I’ve been having a major writers block moment but today, inspiration hit and here is PART NINETEEN! HOW CRAZY IS THAT?! **

Harry walked into the room that had become a double office for him and [Y/N], wearing only his boxers and a baggy white hoodie. The only sounds that could be heard were the sounds of the keys being pressed on [Y/N]’s laptop and the padding of Harry’s feet on the wooden floor of the office. [Y/N] looked up from her computer screen and smiled at her boyfriend, removing her glasses momentarily to rub at her eyes. Harry sat on his computer chair and wheeled over to his love’s desks and rest his legs on the edge of it.

“My mum wants to know if we want to go and spend the weekend at her house.” [Y/N] quickly signed off the email that she’d been writing, before making sure that her meeting with a decorator was booked fully for the week after.

“That would be nice, I’ve missed her. Do you want to go tomorrow then? Stay until Sunday?”

“Yeah if that’s all good?” [Y/N] nodded before smiling at her boyfriend, her eyes closing for a few seconds before opening again and looking at Harry fully. “Take a break, babe. You’ve been in here since 7:30 and it’s already 3. Come and have an hour nap with me or something.”

“I can’t sweets. I’ve got a Skype meeting with a caterer for the Christmas party. I’ll not be long, actually I could do with you being here with me for it, it’s your Christmas party after all.” Harry wheeled so he was in front of [Y/N], his hands coming to rest on her knees.

“I’ve told you, it’s not MY party, it’s OURS now! You live here with me. Also, a caterer? Two months before the party? It’s not even been Halloween yet.” [Y/N] shook her head while chuckling lightly.

“Baby, you’re funny. This is the first of what will turn into 4 or 5 meetings sweets. We’ve got today’s which is going over the kind of foods we want to have there, then the next one they’ll go through a menu of things and see what we like or don’t like. The third we’ll actually meet up and taste the food.” Harry’s eyes lit up at the sound of a food tasting session. “Finally, the week before the party we’ll have one final tasting session just to make sure that everything is good. Then that meeting we’ll also go through the set up for the food and things. This will happen for the decorators too.”

“You are absolutely amazing at what you do, my love. How long until the meeting with them?” [Y/N] double checked her diary before letting Harry know that it wouldn’t be for another ten minutes so if he needed a wee to go now. “I’ll be back shortly.” He planted a kiss on his girlfriend’s lips before walking out of the room.

A few minutes later Harry walked back into the office, wearing a plain black top and carrying two mugs with him.

“If you’re not having a nap then you’re going to enjoy this cup of coffee that your insanely hot boyfriend has brought for you to drink while we talk to the caterers about our Christmas party menu. Can we get them to make glazed pigs in blankets on sticks?”

[Y/N] took the mug from Harry’s hands and took a sip of the coffee, letting the hot liquid burn her throat as she did. Harry sat on his chair and wheeled it around the table, so they were sat next to one another and ready to start the Skype meeting.

“Oh my insanely hot boyfriend knows the way to my heart! Thank you!” Once she’d placed her drink on the desk, she turned to Harry and kissed his lips quickly. “And yeah, we can have glazed pigs in blankets, my love.”

***

When their alarm went off the following morning, [Y/N] was the first to wake up. Once she’d turned the alarm off, she turned over so she was facing him. His face was pushed into the pillow, his lips pouting ever so slightly and his hair falling over his eyes. She brought her hand up to brush his hair away and pressed her lips to his to try and wake him up.

“Baby? We need to get up so we can go and see your mum.” When Harry didn’t budge from his sleep, [Y/N] moved her hand so the back of it was against the soft skin of his cheek. Her fingers brushed at his face softly, watching as his breathing became a little ragged. “I know you’re awake, sleepy head.” His lips lifted into a small, almost unnoticeable smirk.

“’m not awake, dunno what you mean, angel.” Harry sunk further into the pillow underneath his head, bringing his arms to wrap around      [Y/N]’s waist to pull her into his hard chest. The pair lay for a few moments basking in one another’s presence, wanting nothing more than for the moment to never end.

“Come on, gorgeous. We have to get up and get going. You promised me a McDonald’s breakfast before we left and it’s already 9am!” She tried to pull herself from Harry’s grasp, only to be pulled even closer to him, her front hitting his with a thump and a groan.

“We aren’t leaving his bed until I get at least one kissy from you. Then we can get up and get ready to go, promise.” His eyes opened and [Y/N]’s thumb came to wipe away the sleep that had formed in the corners of them over night. Her hands rest on his jawline, and her thumbs rubbed at his cheekbones as she leaned in to press her lips against Harry’s. She pulled away but Harry brought his hands up to rest at her neck, pulling her in for more. “I said at least one, I’ve got another good one for you right,” he pulled his forehead away from hers to look into her eyes, and then proceeded to move his lips back toward hers, “here.” When their lips touched again, they both moved impossibly close to the other, their breaths becoming one.

When they finally parted, they were both gasping for breath and smiling widely. The both of them stretched their bodies before standing from the bed, tired eyes on the both of them. Harry walked into the closet while [Y/N] walked to turn the shower on so she could clean her body before their long car journey. Before stepping under the hot water, she brushed her teeth and got the shower products she wanted to use ready.

“Hey, mind if I join you?” [Y/N] looked through the shower door to see Harry stood in just his boxers with a smile on his face. “No funny business, I just can’t be bothered waiting for you to finish.”

“I guess, but no funny business! And don’t get my hair wet, I only washed it last night.” Harry stepped into the shower and stepped under the water, making his girlfriend move out of the stream of the water; causing her to groan loudly. “IT’S COLD NOT BEING UNDER THERE!”

“Here, turn around so your back is against me.” While she turned around, Harry grabbed the shower gel and loofa before lathering it up. “I’ll wash you. Just stand here and keep warm.”

“Thank you gorgeous.”

***

“CHAAAIIIIIIIN, KEEP US TOGETHER!!” The car was filled with the sounds of Fleetwood Mac playing, and laughter from the two people. Harry turned the dial in the car to turn the music down, taking his eyes off the road for a second to look at his girlfriend.

“We won’t be long until we’re there, ladybug.” [Y/N]’s hand fumbled around to grab onto Harry’s, bringing it up to kiss lovingly. Harry then brought [Y/N]’s hand up to kiss too, a smile plastered on both of their faces as they did. Their hands retreated to rest on [Y/N]’s leg, not untangling from one another as they did so.

“Good, my bum is starting to go numb from sitting here for so long.” A soft chuckle was shared between the two people before the car fell quiet once more, Fleetwood Mac still playing through the speakers at a reduced volume.

The rest of the car ride was silent, comfortably so, but still silent. Harry would steal glances at his girlfriend, and smirked when she caught him staring. As they pulled up to Anne’s house, [Y/N] saw the woman who’d given her the best boyfriend standing at the door, a large smile similar to Harry’s adorning her face.

Anne walked toward the car once it stopped and rather than saying hello to her son, she walked over to his girlfriend and embraced her tightly, telling her how much she’d missed her and was happy to see her again. Harry stood to the side, a loving smile on his face as he watched two of his favourite women hugging and smiling together. Once the hug broke, his mum opened her arms for him and he walked straight into them, leaning down to be at her level and holding her just as tightly as she was holding him. [Y/N] brought her hand up and placed it upon Harry’s which sat on his mother’s back, enjoying the love that was radiating from the pair.

“Come on you two, let’s get you inside where it’s warm. You still drink coffee, right lovely?” [Y/N] could see Harry chuckled besides her as she replied to the woman who raised her boyfriend.

“Only with my oxygen.” Anne laughed at her response before walking them into the kitchen of her home and placing a hot coffee in front of each of them. “Oh you are an actual superstar! Thank you.” The first sip of coffee hit [Y/N]’s throat and she closed her eyes in bliss. Coffee had been the thing that got her through so many days but now she’d grown to just love the taste, and feeling it gave her when she drank it, no longer needing it for the energy.

The three people walked through the house and into Anne’s living room, where the TV played a Strictly Come Dancing rerun quietly. As Harry and [Y/N] sat on the smaller of the sofas that sat in the room, Harry pulled his girlfriend into him and draped her legs over his own, using his hands to rub at her calves while she rest her head on his shoulder.

“How’ve you been, Anne? It seems like it’s been ages since I last saw you.” Anne placed her mug of tea on the coffee table before smiling at the two people in front of her. Though she would never admit it, she was sceptical when Harry had told her that he’d met a girl in Starbucks and that she’d been a fan; sceptical that the girl was only wanting to date him because he was Harry Styles; and sceptical that Harry’s heart would be broken. But seeing the two of them in front of her, Harry’s eyes flicking to his girlfriend every now and then to make sure she was still there, and his lips not being able to stay in a straight line whenever he did, she knew that they were good together, and that they were happy. Harry was happy, and she was happy that he was happy. She’d grown to love [Y/N] like a daughter and knew that it wasn’t about the fame, but that she really, truly loved Harry and Anne couldn’t be more grateful.

“I’ve been good thank you sweets. Really good.” She smiled at [Y/N], who had placed her hand on Harry’s which were resting on her legs at that point. “What are your plans for the next few weeks?”

“I have graduation in three weeks and then Harry flies out to LA for Halloween the day after. I’ll be having meetings regarding the Christmas party and then I have to meet up with my boss to decide what’s happening next year and where we want to take things. Feel free to come down for a bit while Harry’s swanning it in the sun, if you’d like!” Harry smiled at his mum, too wrapped up in his thoughts that he hadn’t heard her speak to him.

“Sorry, what was that?”

“You really are ridiculous sometimes. I asked why you’re in LA.”

“It’s the Casamigo’s Halloween party, and then I have to have a few meetings with Jeff to discuss the new album. I’ll only be gone for a week or two. Then it’ll be back home to my gorgeous girlfriend and planning Christmas.” [Y/N]’s cheeks heated as Harry called her gorgeous, and she lightly kissed his shoulder as he grabbed her hand. “But, [Y/N], don’t forget that when I’m in LA Liv is coming for a couple of days.” [Y/N]’s eyes widened at the realisation before turning to Anne.

“I forgot she was coming! You’re still more than welcome. Gems could come too, and we’ll have a proper girly day!”

“That would be lovely, dear.”

***

After lunch, Harry and [Y/N] had gone upstairs to unpack their bags while Anne popped to the shops to get a few bits for their evening meal. When she returned to the house, the couple weren’t downstairs and so she walked up to Harry’s bedroom to see if they were there. The door was ajar slightly and as she peered around it, she saw her son and his girlfriend underneath the covers, with their foreheads touching, fast asleep. Even though they were covered by a thin sheet, she could see the outline of Harry’s hand resting upon [Y/N]’s hip. She smiled at the view before taking a quick photo-purely to show the two later on in the day-and leaving the room, closing the door behind her as to not wake them up when she started to cook.

An hour later, [Y/N] walked through to the kitchen with tired eyes and a smile plastered on her face. Anne had Queen playing through her speaker while she made the lasagne for their dinner. When she heard someone at the door, she turned around with a smile and ushered the younger girl into the kitchen and to sit on one of the stools at the island.

“Did you have a nice nap?” [Y/N] nodded, while yawning and rubbing at her eyes.

“I did thank you. I blame your son for this by the way, he’s got me into the habit of having a nap every now and then, but I hate it. It makes me feel so unproductive.”

“He’s a nuisance like that. He’s always been the same too, having a quick hour nap through the day. But then he wonders why he can’t sleep on a night.” [Y/N]’s head nodded quickly, as if to prove that she really did agree.

“That happens every time he takes a nap! But if I haven’t had one and could fall asleep easily, he’ll talk to me until I’m no longer sleep then we’re both awake for hours longer than necessary. It’s a good job I love him.” Anne smiled at that, knowing that Harry really was loved, and it wasn’t just a show. The way it so easily fell from [Y/N]’s mouth made her realise even more that what the two shared was real.

“You really do love him, don’t you? This isn’t a short-term thing.”

“I hope it isn’t a short-term thing, in my eyes I know that Harry is it for me. I assure you that I will do everything in my power to make Harry the happiest I can. He came into my life when it was hectic, and even though he’s a busy man himself, he was willing to spend as much time as he could with me when I wasn’t trying to write essays and get everything sent off, so I can graduate.” [Y/N] smiled at the top of the island remembering everything she’s gone through with Harry. “When he goes away, even if it’s just for a couple of hours to go to an interview, or if he has a meeting, my heart physically aches until he comes home and hugs me. Sometimes I feel weird and that he thinks I’m too clingy.” Anne stayed silent, so she could hear the rest of what [Y/N] was saying, the smile on her face never dimming. “I’ve seen him perform a couple of times but when I saw him do the gig in LA for a few people, I came to realise just how utterly proud I am of him. He gives his all to everything he does and seeing him performing just makes me heart swell even more. It’s the little things that make me realise how much I love him, the way he will hold eye contact while I’m talking, even if I’m looking a different way, the way he just grabs my hand when we’re sat down, and draws patterns on it; the way that when he wakes up in the middle of the night he’ll grab onto my waist and pull me even closer to him, with his nose pressed to the back of my neck as he drifts back off into sleep; and mainly, the love he has, and shows for you. He loves me, but he honestly adores you! He tells me all the time that he loves you and I realise that you are number one in his life, but that is completely fine with me. You’ve brought the most loving, respectful, trustworthy man into the world and I love you for that.”

“[Y/N], you have no idea how lovely that was to hear. Can I tell you something?”

“Of course.” It was almost a whisper, her voice wavering as the nerves hit her.

“The day that Harry called me and told me that he’d met a girl in Starbucks and that she’d been a fan of his for a while, I got so scared that the girl was in it for the money, and the fame of being linked with ‘Harry Styles’,” Anne made air quotes around her son’s name, while [Y/N] came to realise that the girl Anne was talking about, was her. “I’ve known for a while that it wasn’t the case, but hearing you tell me all of those things, and seeing you and Harry together, I realise how stupid I was to ever think that. I love you and I love that you love Harry.”

“I have never thought of Harry as anything but ‘Harry’. My mind has never gone ‘Oh my days I’m dating Harry Styles’, it’s ‘oh my days, I’m dating Harry, and I love him’. Harry is the most down to earth, loving man that has ever walked the earth. He’s the man who loves his family more than anything and would do literally anything for them. Your son is the best thing that has ever happened to me, and the world; so yeah, I was a fan before I met him, but now I’m his fan in a completely different way.”

[Y/N] stood up from her place and let Anne’s arms wrap around her. They stood in a hug for five minutes before Harry walked into the kitchen and looked at the two women curiously.

“What’s going on here?” Anne let go of [Y/N] and walked back to the oven while [Y/N] walked to Harry, wrapping her arms around him and nesting her face in his neck.

“Nothing, feel better after your nap?”

“I do for now, until later when I can’t sleep.” Everyone in the room laughed and as it died down, Anne could be heard to hum happily. She turned around to see Harry pressing his lips to [Y/N]’s, pulling away quickly and smiling at her with his eyes being slightly narrowed due to his cheeks rising with the smile.

***

“Where’s [Y/N]?” Harry sat on the sofa next to his mum, bringing his phone out of his pocket so he could sit comfortably.

“Oh, she’s just having a quick shower, she’ll be down in twenty minutes or so. Can we have a chat please?” Anne placed her mug on the coffee table and turned her body, so she was facing her son, her hands on her knees and her head tilted slightly.

“Of course! What’s bothering you?”

“How do you know that you’re in love? Like, when it’s the real deal and you want it to last forever?” Harry looked straight into his mum’s eyes, hoping to get her true reaction. What he couldn’t see were the thoughts that went through her mind. Her conversation with [Y/N] replaying in her head.

“What’s making you ask this?”

“I’ve got something to do but I just want to be sure that what I’m feeling is what I think it is.”

“You know you’re in love when the first person that comes to mind when you do anything, is them. When you can close your eyes and picture them sat smiling at you; when they’re happiness means everything to you and you would do anything you could to make them happy; when if you aren’t with them you want to be with them, even if they’re only in the room next to you; and when any time their name is spoken, you immediately smile and your heart starts beating faster because you’re excited. Being in love is something that you do have to work on though, and it isn’t always sunshine. You have blips when you’re in love, but it’s the love you share that means you can’t walk away.” Anne looked at Harry, who had a serious look on his face, playing with the rings on his fingers and his knee bouncing fast. “Is everything okay?”

Harry didn’t respond, the silence in the room almost deafening to Anne, who worried that Harry was going to tell her that he was no longer in love with the girl who was upstairs, and that he was going to end things with her. She knew it wasn’t fair to think that but when Harry had been silent for a few seconds, scrolling through his phone, she feared the worst. Until Harry turned his phone around and showed her the screen he was on.

“I love her mum. She is the love of my life and I’ve known for a while now. I know we’ve only been in a relationship for seven months, but we were dating for three months before that. I love her more than I love myself and I want her to be by my side for the rest of my life, every day I want to see her, and only her. I want to wake up next to her on a morning, I want to have children with her, I want to travel with her and I want to grow old with her. She’s my everything.”

The light blue box sat in his underwear drawer, underneath all of them where he knew no one would see it. The photo he was showing Anne had the box open, a soleste cut, white gold ring, with the words ‘all my love, H’ engraved on the underside of it. He couldn’t help the smile on his face as he watched his mum’s eyes widen, then glisten as tears threatened to spill.

“I want to ask her to marry me.”

question: Lol at zayn with his selective memories, maybe someone should remind him of his own snide comments (including his former friend naughty boy and randomly Calvin Harris)
answer:
RIGHT!

Dude is all for instilling false tales of how perfect of an angel he is but forgets that we witnessed his shitty moments. To this day, that Naughty Boy issue bothers me because it was in that moment we discovered his real reasoning for leaving 1D.

Now, the Calvin Harris feud is one I don’t remember coming across and I think it’s because I started to avoid seeing anything about Zayn. But please, do spill the tea on my mans Calvin.

summary: What do you think about zigi? I know nobody's perfect but I just don't understand how someone like gigi can like Zayn, like...
question: What do you think about zigi? I know nobody's perfect but I just don't understand how someone like gigi can like Zayn, like lately I've been looking at both and Zayn looks like a junkie and idk, I hoped Gigi to go for better. I mean, Bella with Abel looks more like a healthy relationship than Zigi
answer:
This is something that’s crossed my mind a lot and I’ve never said anything because fans of Zayn are going to take my opinion to heart. But since you’ve asked, I have no choice but to answer you. 😊

Personally, I haven’t been a huge fan of their relationship to begin with. I think it’s another way of Zayn trying to forget his previous life. He spent four years in a boy band and three years dating a singer (Perrie Edwards) from a girl group. And the crazy thing is that his pull away from both of those aspects happened around the same time.

Whenever asked about his relationship with 1D and Perrie, he wants to seem like the good guy that wishes them well and as if he’s on good terms with them all. But we know about his relationship with the boys and we know he broke up with Perrie through text. That right there confirmed that he was trying to forget where he came from like Zac Efron with High School Musical.

Not only do I think Zigi is a solution to erasing his previous life but I also think he uses their relationship as a boost in his solo career.

A couple of months ago, a fellow 1D fan pointed out to me that his breakup with Gigi was the solution to getting everyone to focus on him. See, his singles as a singer weren’t really doing him justice. So, he and Gigi split and when that happened, all eyes were on both stars. With our attention finally on them, it was the perfect moment for Zayn to release “Let Me”. Once he released that and received the appropriate amount of responses that pleased his eyes, he and Gigi got back together.

Thinking back on it now, I agreed with that fan. Especially reading the couples responses to the breakup, it even sounded fake and put together by their management teams.

I’m like you as well, I don’t like judging couples because love is love. But I’m also wondering why Gigi is with someone like Zayn.😂

Thinking back on it now, I agreed with that fan. Especially reading the couples responses to the breakup, it even sounded fake and put together by their management teams.

I’m like you as well, I don’t like judging couples because love is love. But I’m also wondering why Gigi is with someone like Zayn.😂

blog.description: So madly in love with Harry.

question: Road trips with Harry
answer:
They would be so nice. You guys would be singing along to whatever song that was playing and you would be taking so many pictures because you wanted to always remember these moments with him. You would make him stop every other hour at a gas station to get snacks and to Pee.

When you guys would stop at a hotel for the night you would spend the time in bed, making love and just enjoying the night and then you would shower and order food. It would be such a perfect night.

Send me concepts
